Welcome v{{blueprintVersion}}

A lightweight layout library for building great responsive mobile first UIs that work everywhere. Open Source, built with CSS Grid and Flexbox.

Getting Started

To get started install via npm. 

npm install blueprint-css@next --save

Alternatively copy and paste the stylesheet <link> into your <head> to load the CSS. 

<link href="https://unpkg.com/blueprint-css@{{blueprintVersion}}/dist/blueprint.min.css" rel="stylesheet" />
